add.name: Coastal
comments: Per the owner: Required to provide additional services for our employees. Helps with accounting keeping it as a separate fee. Have to provide support services for burnout, such as counseling. Not health insurance.

add.name: Paradise Cove Beach Cafe
comments: On two different menus, the 5% had a different name.

add.name: El Torito
comments: Not mentioned on the menu, but the restaurant had a plaque up front at the host station. The manager explained it was corporate policy and could not remove the fee, but she did discount the check to compensate.

add.name: Pizza Hut
comments: "The service fee partially offsets the increased cost of operations in the state of California."

add.name: Petit Trois
comments: As of Aug 2, changed fee from 18% to 4%.

"A 4% surcharge is added to all food and beverage sales.
This is not a gratuity and is retained in its entirety by the company to enable us to offer benefits to our team members.
If you prefer that this charge be removed, please let any member of our team know."
The waiter made a special announcement to the table that the service fee was not a tip.
